title: Episode 69: Personal Space Invasions - Ethical Implications of one of Psychology's Strangest Studies
description: Remember the psychological study conducted in a men's room?  Think it was silly?  Unethical?  Let's revisit this study and take a close look at what the critics say and what the authors themselves have to say in response.  A fascinating look at the ethics and history of research in psychology.
